TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISymbolWriter

summary.span: 代表 Managed 程式碼的符號寫入器。

span.span: Represents a symbol writer for managed code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面會提供定義文件，序列點、 語彙範圍變數的方法。The interface provides methods that define documents, sequence points, lexical scopes, and variables. > [!NOTE] > 這是介面的 managed 對應項目`ISymUnmanagedWriter`介面，也就是其中一個非受控的符號存放區介面可提供讀取和寫入偵錯符號資訊的替代方式。This interface is the managed counterpart of the `ISymUnmanagedWriter` interface, which is one of the unmanaged symbol store interfaces that provides an alternative way to read and write debug symbol information.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Close ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed
Public Sub Close ()
public: void Close();
abstract member Close : unit -> unit

summary.span: 關閉 和認可符號存放區的符號。

span.span: Closes and commits the symbols to the symbol store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫後，失效的進一步更新。After this call, becomes invalid for further updates.

Public Sub CloseMethod ()
public: void CloseMethod();
abstract member CloseMethod : unit -> unit

summary.span: 關閉目前的方法。

span.span: Closes the current method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在關閉方法之後，您無法定義其內的符號。After a method is closed, you cannot define a symbol from within it.

span.span: Closes the most recent namespace.

span.span: The points past the last instruction in the scope.

summary.span: 關閉目前的語彙範圍。

span.span: Closes the current lexical scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 關閉範圍之後，您無法從定義變數內。After a scope is closed, you cannot define a variable from within it.

span.span: The start offset for the variable.

param.span: 如果這個參數是零，則會忽略它，並定義整個範圍的變數。

span.span: If this parameter is zero, it is ignored and the variable is defined throughout the entire scope.

param.span: 如果這個參數不是零，該變數便會落在目前範圍的位移內。

span.span: If the parameter is nonzero, the variable falls within the offsets of the current scope.

param.name: endOffset

span.span: The end offset for the variable.

param.span: 如果這個參數是零，則會忽略它，並定義整個範圍的變數。

span.span: If this parameter is zero, it is ignored and the variable is defined throughout the entire scope.

param.span: 如果這個參數不是零，該變數便會落在目前範圍的位移內。

span.span: If the parameter is nonzero, the variable falls within the offsets of the current scope.

summary.span: 在目前的語彙範圍中定義單一變數。

span.span: Defines a single variable in the current lexical scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `startOffset`和`endOffset`參數是選擇性的。The `startOffset` and `endOffset` parameters are optional. 如果其值為零，則會予以忽略，並在整個範圍定義的變數。If their value is zero, they are ignored and the variable is defined throughout the entire scope. 如果其值為非零值，變數會落在目前的範圍的位移。If their value is nonzero, the variable falls within the offsets of the current scope. 您可以呼叫多次的整個範圍的不同位移範圍中出現多個相同名稱的變數。You can call multiple times for a variable of the same name that occurs multiple times in different offset ranges throughout a scope. （在此情況下，開始和結束位移不得重疊。）(In this case, start and end offsets must not overlap.)

summary.span: 定義目前方法中的單一參數。

span.span: Defines a single parameter in the current method.

summary.span: 每一個參數的型別是從它位於方法簽章內的位置中取出。

span.span: The type of each parameter is taken from its position within the signature of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的方法的中繼資料中定義了參數，您不必呼叫此方法與重新定義。If parameters are defined in the metadata for a given method, you do not have to define them again with calls to this method. 首先，檢查這些一般的中繼資料中，然後使用 符號存放區，需要符號讀取器。Symbol readers need to check for these in the normal metadata first, and then use the symbol store.

param.name: document
param.span: 要為其定義序列點的文件物件。

span.span: The document object for which the sequence points are being defined.

param.name: offsets
param.span: 從方法的開頭來測量的序列點位移。

span.span: The sequence point offsets measured from the beginning of methods.
The document lines for the sequence points.
The document positions for the sequence points.
The document end lines for the sequence points.

param.name: endColumns
param.span: 序列點的文件結束位置。

span.span: The document end positions for the sequence points.

summary.span: 在目前的方法內定義一組序列點。

span.span: Defines a group of sequence points within the current method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每一列和每個資料行定義中方法的陳述式開頭。Each line and each column defines the start of a statement within a method. 要以位移的遞增順序排序的陣列。The arrays should be sorted in increasing order of offsets. 此位移一律為開頭的方法，以位元組為單位的位移。The offset is always the offset from the start of the method, in bytes.

span.span: The metadata emitter interface.

param.name: filename
param.span: 偵錯符號寫入的檔案名稱。

span.span: The file name for which the debugging symbols are written.

param.span: 有些寫入器需要檔名，有些則不需要。

span.span: Some writers require a file name, and others do not.

param.span: 如果檔案名稱是指定給不使用檔案名稱的寫入器，則這個參數會被忽略。

span.span: If a file name is specified for a writer that does not use file names, this parameter is ignored.

param.name: fFullBuild
param.span: 表示這是完整重建，而 則表示這是累加編譯。

span.span: indicates that this is a full rebuild; indicates that this is an incremental compilation.

summary.span: 設定要與寫入器產生關聯的中繼資料發出者介面。

span.span: Sets the metadata emitter interface to associate with a writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 也會設定輸出檔案名稱寫入偵錯符號的位置。 also sets the output file name where the debugging symbols are written. 這個方法可以呼叫一次，並必須在其他任何寫入方法之前呼叫。This method can be called only once and must be called before any other writer methods.

MemberSignature.Value: public void OpenMethod (System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken method);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OpenMethod(valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken method) cil managed
Public Sub OpenMethod (method As SymbolToken)
public: void OpenMethod(System::Diagnostics::SymbolStore::SymbolToken method);
abstract member OpenMethod : System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken -> unit

param.name: method
param.span: 要開啟之方法的中繼資料語彙基元。

span.span: The metadata token for the method to be opened.

summary.span: 開啟要置入符號資訊的方法。

span.span: Opens a method to place symbol information into.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的方法會變成目前的方法，來定義序列點、 參數和語彙範圍的呼叫。The specified method becomes the current method for calls to define sequence points, parameters, and lexical scopes. 沒有隱含的語彙範圍，整個方法。There is an implicit lexical scope around the entire method. 重新開啟先前已關閉的方法，就會清除任何先前定義的符號方法。Reopening a method that has been previously closed erases any previously defined symbols for the method.

span.span: The name of the new namespace.

summary.span: 開啟新的命名空間。

span.span: Opens a new namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定義命名空間中存在的變數或方法之前呼叫這個方法。Call this method before defining methods or variables that exist within a namespace. 可以是巢狀命名空間。Namespaces can be nested.

MemberSignature.Value: public int OpenScope (int startOffset);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 OpenScope(int32 startOffset) cil managed
Public Function OpenScope (startOffset As Integer) As Integer
public: int OpenScope(int startOffset);
abstract member OpenScope : int -> int

param.name: startOffset
param.span: 從方法開頭到語彙範圍中第一個指令的位移 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the method to the first instruction in the lexical scope.

summary.span: 開啟目前方法中的新語彙範圍。

span.span: Opens a new lexical scope in the current method.

returns.span: 不透明範圍識別項，稍後可以與 一起用來定義範圍的起始和結束位移。

span.span: An opaque scope identifier that can be used with to define the start and end offsets of a scope at a later time.

returns.span: 在這種情況下，傳遞到 和 的位移會被忽略。

span.span: In this case, the offsets passed to and are ignored.

returns.span: 範圍識別項只有在目前方法中才會有效。

span.span: A scope identifier is valid only in the current method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此範圍會成為新的目前範圍，並推送至堆疊的範圍。This scope becomes the new current scope and is pushed onto a stack of scopes. 範圍必須形成階層。Scopes must form a hierarchy. 同層級項目不允許重疊。Siblings are not allowed to overlap. 範圍識別項會在目前的方法中才有效。Scope identifiers are valid only in the current method.

span.span: Sets the underlying (the corresponding unmanaged interface) that a managed uses to emit symbols.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基礎`ISymUnmanagedWriter`（對應的 unmanaged 的介面） 代表 managed 程式碼的符號寫入器。The underlying `ISymUnmanagedWriter` (the corresponding unmanaged interface) represents a symbol writer for managed code. 介面會提供方法來定義文件，序列點、 語彙範圍變數。The interface provides methods for defining documents, sequence points, lexical scopes, and variables.

abstract member SetUserEntryPoint : System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken -> unit

param.name: entryMethod
param.span: 方法的中繼資料語彙基元，這是使用者進入點。

span.span: The metadata token for the method that is the user entry point.

summary.span: 識別使用者定義的方法做為目前模組的進入點。

span.span: Identifies the user-defined method as the entry point for the current module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這通常是主要的方法，而不是編譯器所產生的虛設常式之前的主要方法。This is normally your main method, rather than compiler-generated stubs before the main method.

MemberSignature.Value: public void UsingNamespace (string fullName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void UsingNamespace(string fullName) cil managed
Public Sub UsingNamespace (fullName As String)
public: void UsingNamespace(System::String ^ fullName);
abstract member UsingNamespace : string -> unit

span.span: The fully qualified name of the namespace.

summary.span: 指定是在開放式語彙範圍內使用指定且完整的命名空間名稱。

span.span: Specifies that the given, fully qualified namespace name is used within the open lexical scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 關閉目前的範圍，可防止此範圍內使用的命名空間。Closing the current scope prevents this scope from using the namespace. 命名空間中保持使用中的所有領域都繼承自目前開啟的範圍。The namespace remains in use in all scopes that inherit from the current open scope.
